attributes.action: Establish Blended Learning, a mixture of online and face-to-face learning.
attributes.additional_details: In the current system, too many lives are being put at risk and children and young people are not having their educational needs met. A policy of Blended Learning offers schools and nurseries the opportunity to nurture children and young people in a time of global crisis and prepare them for the challenges that lie ahead of them.
attributes.background: I want the Government to consult teachers, parents and young people and implement a Blended Learning policy (including more Forest Schools for Early Years) in a timely fashion.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551615
